meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Sellers Emily Garber Joey Falco Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6349.

td.p: John Sellers, a writer from Brooklyn, New York
Emily Garber, a civil liberties lawyer from Portland, Oregon
Joey Falco, a writer from Santa Monica, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $23,999)

tr.td: A SHOWER OF APRIL
THE "IV" LEAGUE
TIME ZONE CITIES
BUY GUM!
TV DRAMAS
WHAT I MEANT TO SAY WAS...
